title: Comment from National Association of Assistant United States Attorneys (NAAUSA)

analysis.key_quote: Advancing this rule would do nothing to enhance accountability in the federal sector nor strengthen the rule of law.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, emphasizing the importance of civil service protections and the risks of politicization in the justice system. It highlights concerns about due process and the merit-based system, which are critical indicators of opposition to the rule.
